note.p: Birth: Coln St Dennis, Gloucestershire, England (14 May 1818)
Death: Pembroke College, Oxford, Oxfordshire (29 December 1898)
Career: Fellow and Tutor, Pembroke College, Oxford; member of Governing Body, Winchester College (1873-1898)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 30-34 signed by R B C
References: Alex D D Craik, 'James Ivory's last papers on the 'Figure of the Earth' (with biographical additions) in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 187-204
